thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1782
thread.title: Brenda Baird

author: Brenda Baird
title: Brenda Baird
text: Booked Airline tickets with FlightHub! The only thing that startled me a little was when I got it fully booked and paid for, every indication was that I would be billed in CAD dollars. But, there was a note on below the charges that it would be charged in USD dollars. It was my misunderstanding! The charges will show up as USD but the amount stated in CAD dollars is what it will amount to! My concern was resolved with a phone call to the 1-800 stated on receipt! Thank you for your help!
